testcase.name: Filter a search by glove material test
testcase.system-out: Given I have searched for an item by category "Reusable gloves".............passed When I filter by Glove Material "Acrylic"...................................passed Then I should see the "Acrylic" in Glove Material column....................passed

testcase.name: Filter a search by brand name test
testcase.system-out: Given I a have searched for a product by category "Reusable gloves".........passed When I filter by brand "Ansell".............................................passed Then I should see the "Ansell" in the description...........................passed

testcase.name: Filter a search by brand name test
testcase.system-out: Given I a have searched for a particular product by category "Reusable gloves".passed When I filter by glove size "One Size"......................................passed Then I should see the "One Size" in the Glove Size section..................passed

testcase.classname: Searching for an item by name
testcase.name: Search for an item test
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the home page of the application..............................passed When I search for an item by name...........................................passed Then I should be able to see the Item price.................................passed

testcase.classname: Searching for an item byRS Stock Number using Quick Order search
testcase.name: Search for an item by stock number test
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the default page of the application...........................passed When I search for an item by RS stock "912-0239" and "1" and click on Add to Basket button.passed Then I should be able to see details of the item searched "FLIR E4 Thermal Imaging Camera, Temp Range: -20 → +250 °C 80 x 60pixel RS Cal" in the basket.passed
